Title: SHAREHOLDING PATTERN
Subtitle: DETAILS OF EQUITY HOLDING OF INSURERS
Company: Bajaj Allianz Life Insurance Company Limited

Shares_pledged_Percentage: As a percentage of Total Shares held
Shares_under_lock_in_Percentage: As a percentage of Total Shares held

FlatHeaders: Shares pledged or otherwise encumbered - Number of shares (VI)
Shares pledged or otherwise encumbered - As a percentage of Total Shares held (VII) = (VI)/(III)*100
Shares under Lock in Period - Number of shares (VIII)
Shares under Lock in Period - As a percentage of Total Shares held (IX) = (VIII)/(III)*100
